mapper.select: select a.id AS id,c.gps_company AS gps_company,d.gps_number AS gps_number from loan_order a left join loan_base_info b on a.loan_base_info_id = b.id left join partner c on b.partner_id = c.id left join install_gps d on a.id = d.order_id where a.id = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
